thread.title: Soldiers, vigilante kill robbery suspect terrorising motorists on Akure-Ilesha Expressway
thread.title_full: Soldiers, vigilante kill robbery suspect terrorising motorists on Akure-Ilesha Expressway

author: Nwafor Polycarp
title: Soldiers, vigilante kill robbery suspect terrorising motorists on Akure-Ilesha Expressway

organizations.name: public relations of the artillery brigade

text:
Home » News » Soldiers, vigilante kill robbery suspect terrorising motorists on Akure-Ilesha Expressway Soldiers, vigilante kill robbery suspect terrorising motorists on Akure-Ilesha Expressway On 3:23 am In News by Nwafor Polycarp Comments 
By Dayo Johnson 
Akure—AFTER over 20 minutes of gun battle, men of the 32 Artillery Brigade, Akure, the Ondo State capital, yesterday, shot dead a member of a six-man robbery gang on Ilesa-Akure Expressway. 
For over a month, the gangsters have been terrorising motorists plying the road, attracting public outcry. 
Vanguard gathered that soldiers manning a checkpoint in Igbara-Oke stormed the robbery scene, following a distress call by motorists. 
One of the robbers was gunned down, while five others, who sustained injuries, fled into the bush. 
Contacted, the Assistant Director of Public Relations of the Artillery Brigade, Captain Ojo Adelegan, confirmed the incident. Nwafor Polycarp
